name: Civil Engineering
tagline: Building tomorrow's infrastructure with sustainable engineering solutions

overview.introduction: The Department of Civil Engineering is dedicated to developing skilled professionals who can design, construct, and maintain sustainable infrastructure for the modern world.
overview.description: Our program combines theoretical knowledge with practical skills in structural engineering, transportation, environmental engineering, and construction management. Students gain hands-on experience through field visits, industry projects, and state-of-the-art laboratories.

programs.name: B.Tech in Civil Engineering
programs.description: Comprehensive undergraduate program covering structural analysis, transportation engineering, environmental engineering, and construction management.

labs.name: Structural Engineering Lab
labs.description: Advanced laboratory for testing and analyzing structural components and materials.

labs.name: Transportation Engineering Lab
labs.description: Modern facility for studying transportation systems and materials.

faculty.name: Dr. Vikram Singh
faculty.bio: Dr. Vikram Singh specializes in structural engineering with expertise in earthquake-resistant design and analysis.

faculty.name: Dr. Anjali Gupta
faculty.bio: Dr. Anjali Gupta focuses on transportation engineering with expertise in sustainable transportation systems.
